name: Grief (itch) (singingstranger)
description:
CONTROLS: 

WASD and mouse

Click on screen once if you cannot move upon starting the game. 

So this game (or at least this build) has low-key horror vibes, hence the tag. 

I have never made lightmap-baking before, but I tried it here to see if it makes the game any easier on my bf's computer.
